data.name: Pro Shooter VR
data.description:
*THE GAME IS IN EARLY ACCESS*

Pro Shooter VR is the world’s first Olympic-style shooting sports game in VR. Challenge yourself in a shooting simulation like never before!

EXPERIENCE REALISTIC PRECISION SHOOTING FOR THE FIRST TIME IN VR
Focus, aim, and make every shot count! Test your endurance, accuracy, and mental resilience.

PLAY OLYMPIC-STYLE SHOOTING SPORTS
Experience what it's like to be a shooting athlete in 10m Air Rifle, 10m Air Pistol, and 25m Rapid Fire.

MODIFY DIFFICULTY
Whether you are a professional in the sport or an amateur playing for the first time, we have difficulty modes tailor-made for you to enjoy.

PLAY ACROSS MULTIPLE RANGES
Participate in a wide variety of shooting ranges and game events.

PRACTICE FOR EXCELLENCE
Improve your gameplay with in-game tutorial videos and a practice range.

changelog.change_log:
Friday  Dec 8, 2023
New Practice and Match Ranges
Added separate ranges for practice mode and match mode for 10m. Air pistol and 10m air rifle mode
Improved lighting and general graphics in all existing ranges
Note from developer
The previous ranges had only gameplay essential assets. We have now added some more props for decoration to make the range feel less empty.

User Experience and Feedback for players
- Added new shot score pop-up in all game modes
- Added new sounds for shot feedback in all game modes
Note from developer
Players will now see a shot score pop-up right above the target after the shot is complete. This helps players with follow-through of a shot and understand the shot score, without getting out of shooting position
-Added Action prompt labels 
Note from developer
We have added new labels at every step for players to understand the shooting mechanic properly. This can be enabled/disabled from main menu settings anytime
- Grip Settings (BETA)
- Added Grip adjustment settings in the game. 
Note from developer
Players will now be able to adjust their grip on the air pistol. The setting will allow players to move the weapon up or down depending on their grip on the weapon.

V1.2
─
UI Overhaul
- NEW UI has been added in Main menu, Burger menu and All the game modes.
- NEW UI for End Game pop session summary.
Note from developer
The new UI Elements are more graphical than textual, targeted to give shooters better understanding of their performance.
New Game Mode
- Added 25m Rapid Fire game event
Note from developer
Rapid fire is a precise and highly competitive event in Shooting sports. Players can now experience the Rapid fire in Pro shooter VR

Miscellaneous
- Added New Skybox in Main Menu Hub
- Added Music player with controls in Main Menu Hub
- Added 5 new soundtracks in the game.

Changelog 1.1.5
UI Overhaul
- NEW UI has been added in Main menu, Burger menu and All the game modes.
- NEW UI for End Game pop session summary.
Note from developer
The new UI Elements are more graphical than textual, targeted to give shooters better understanding of their performance.
New Game Mode
- Added 25m Rapid Fire game event
Note from developer
Rapid fire is a precise and highly competitive event in Shooting sports. Players can now experience the Rapid fire in Pro shooter VR

- Miscellaneous
- Added New Skybox in Main Menu Hub
- Added Music player with controls in Main Menu Hub
- Added 5 new soundtracks in the game.

CHANGE LOG 
Saturday,  Jul 15, 2023
V1.1.4

10m Air Pistol
- New Reload mechanics
Note from developer
Reload is now improved and easier for new users. Earlier picking up pellets was difficult due to its size. Now Bullet will snap to finger making it easier to load in the weapon

10m Air Rifle
- Added Rifle Stand
Note from developer
We have added a stand for rifle shooters in the game. Its a standard practice in the 10m Air rifle shooting sport.
- New Reload mechanics
Note from developer
Reload is now improved and easier for new users. Earlier picking up pellets was difficult due to its size. Now Bullet will snap to finger making it easier to load in the weapon

 Miscellaneous Bug Fixes & improvements
- Fixed Popup not disappearing after lost internet connection
- Fixed various UI placement bugs
- Added new soundtrack in the ranges

V1.1.3
─
10m Air Rifle
- Improved Backsight
Note from developer
Earlier backsight was too wide and made it difficult to focus on the target. With the new backsight, players should get exact sight pictures as they do IRL.

-Improved Front sight
Note from developer
With changed backsight, we had to make several changes to front sight as well. The front sight is now more crisp and clear to help players get exact sight picture 
 
- Miscellaneous Bug Fixes
- Fixed scores showed on the display
Note from developer
Across all game modes, the score closer to the lines sometimes bugged to a lower number. Now the scoring will be exact and players will be able to see exactly where the shot was hit. 

- Last shot color change
Note from developer
Players demanded to show the last taken shot in a different color on priority. We have acknowledged it and changed the last shot in each game mode in a different color.


- Changed Render Pipeline to URP
Note from developer
Shifted the entire game to URP. With this render pipeline the overall quality of graphics will be marginally improved. Players will be able to see the back sights and front sights of the weapon even more clearly.

10m Air Rifle

- Improved Back-sight
Note from developer
Earlier backsight was too wide and made it difficult to focus on the target. With the new backsight, players should get exact sight pictures as they do IRL

-Improved Front sight
Note from developer
With changed backsight, we had to make several changes to front sight as well. The front sight is now more crisp and clear to help players get exact sight picture 
 
- Miscellaneous Bug Fixes

- Fixed scores showed on the display
Note from developer
Across all game modes, the score closer to the lines sometimes bugged to a lower number. Now the scoring will be exact and players will be able to see exactly where the shot was hit. 

- Last shot color change
Note from developer
Players demanded to show the last taken shot in a different color on priority. We have acknowledged it and changed the last shot in each game mode in a different color.

- Changed Render Pipeline to URP
Note from developer
Shifted the entire game to URP. With this render pipeline the overall quality of graphics will be marginally improved. Players will be able to see the back sights and front sights of the weapon even more clearly.

V1.1.2
─
10m Air Pistol
- New Improved Back-sight
Note from developer
Earlier back-sight notch was too wide and made it harder to aim. Now with new updated back-sight with reduced notch gap, players should feel it is more realistic and be able to aim better. 

- New Targets for Amateur and Semi Pro mode
Note from developer
As per feedback from players and real life shooting sports athletes, we have made the target sizes universal across all the difficulties. Earlier the targets for amateur and semi pro were bigger and it was difficult to get an accurate sight picture as plates do in real life
With updated targets players will be able to get a perfect sight picture across all difficulties enforcing our intention to create a realistic shooting experience.

- Changed  scoring as per target sizes
Note from developer
With target sizes the same across all difficulties , we have come up with a new scoring system for difficulties. Players will be able to experience difference in amateur ,semi-pro and pro difficulties on the same size target.

10m Air Rifle
- New Targets for Amateur and Semi Pro mode
- Changed  scoring as per target sizes
- Miscellaneous Bug Fixes
- Changed the colors of the display
- Fixed minor changes in Teleport
- changed the color of interaction cubes on both Air Pistol and Rifle.

10m Air Pistol

- New Improved Back-sight

Note from developer
Earlier back-sight notch was too wide and made it harder to aim. Now with new updated back-sight with reduced notch gap, players should feel it is more realistic and  be able to aim better. 

- New Targets for Amateur and Semi Pro mode
Note from developer
As per feedback from players and real life shooting sports athletes, we have made the target sizes universal across all the difficulties. Earlier the targets for amateur and semi pro were bigger and it was difficult to get an accurate sight picture as plates do in real life
With updated targets players will be able to get a perfect sight picture across all difficulties enforcing our intention to create a realistic shooting experience.

- Changed  scoring as per target sizes

Note from developer
With target sizes the same across all difficulties , we have come up with a new scoring system for difficulties. Players will be able to experience difference in amateur ,semi-pro and pro difficulties on the same size target.


10m Air Rifle
- New Targets for Amateur and Semi Pro mode
- Changed  scoring as per target sizes

- Miscellaneous Bug Fixes
- Changed the colors of the display
- Fixed minor changes in Teleport
- changed the color of interaction cubes on both Air Pistol and Rifle.
